subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} - pictographic representation of an arrow. More recognizable in older forms.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*d/s-ləy||slingshot, bow (weapon)}} (STEDT). See [http://stedt.berkeley.edu/~stedt-cgi/rootcanal.pl/etymon/2411 here] for cognates.

{{och-l|矢}} shifted its meaning from the weapon to the projectile by means of metonymy.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|嚆矢|張弓挾矢|弓矢|弓折矢盡|一矢之地|兵盡矢窮|流矢|矢石|栝矢亞|發矢|有的放矢|矢無虛發|眾矢之的|矢不虛發|矢口否認|桑弧蓬矢|拉矢|永矢弗諼|矢盡兵窮|矢量|矢車菊|矢志|矢言|矢石如雨|矢石之難|矢棋|矢在弦上|矢口|矢人|矢下如雨|矢勤矢勇|狗矢|攢矢|無的放矢|矢石之間|桃弧棘矢|楛矢|飛矢|鍛矢|集矢|躬蹈矢石|身當矢石}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Usage notes
subSections.text: Used in the ''{{w|Nihon Shoki}}'' (720 {{CE}}) as {{m|ja|借音|tr=shakuon}} ''kana'' for {{IPAfont|⟨si⟩}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text: From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=や|-}}. Found in the ''{{w|Kojiki}}'' of 712 {{CE}}, and in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'' completed some time after 759 {{CE}}.<ref>{{RQ:Manyoshu|3|262}}, text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man3Yos.html#262 here]</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|さ}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=さ|-}}.  Found in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', completed some time after 759 {{CE}}.<ref>{{RQ:Manyoshu|20|4430}}, text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man20Yo.html#4430 here]: the {{m|ja|佐|tr=sa}} in {{w|man'yōgana}} in the original is interpreted by [https://kotobank.jp/word/%E7%9F%A2-143387#E3.83.87.E3.82.B8.E3.82.BF.E3.83.AB.E5.A4.A7.E8.BE.9E.E6.B3.89 Daijisen] as this {{lang|ja|矢}} (''sa'').</ref>

Possibly cognate with {{cog|ojp|-}}-derived {{m|ja|幸|tr=sachi||a hunting implement}} and {{cog|ko|살||arrow}}.

This reading does not appear to be used in modern Japanese.

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|戦|いくさ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|軍|いくさ}}
* {{ja-r|投ぐる矢の|なぐる さ の|pos=pillow word}}
